board the pin is saved to","newBoardId":"ID of the new board to save the pin to Requirements: - Board with the given ID must exist - Pin ID must be unique within the board","pinId":"ID of the pin to edit"}},"getBoardById(uint256)":{"details":"Get board information by its ID","params":{"boardId":"ID of the board to get"},"returns":{"_0":"Board struct containing board information Requirements: - Board ID cannot be zero - Board with the given ID must exist"}},"getBoardsByOwner(address)":{"details":"Get boards owned by a specific address","params":{"owner":"Address of the board
